mapper.sql:
select fdi.aging_parts , ui.password , ui.member_level_id , fdi.deep_analysis_unlocked , fdi.custom_plan_unlocked , fdi.impression_age , ui.phone_number , fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 , fdi.face_detection_info_id , ui.email , ui.username
FROM face_detection_info fdi left join user_info ui on fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 = ui.user_info_id
mapper.select:
select fdi.aging_parts , ui.password , ui.member_level_id , fdi.deep_analysis_unlocked , fdi.custom_plan_unlocked , fdi.impression_age , ui.phone_number , fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 , fdi.face_detection_info_id , ui.email , ui.username
,upload_image.resource_id as upload_image_resource_id ,upload_image.resource_name as upload_image_resource_name ,upload_image.resource_path as upload_image_resource_path ,upload_image.related_table_name as upload_image_related_table_name ,upload_image.related_table_key as upload_image_related_table_key ,upload_image.relate_table_column_name as upload_image_relate_table_column_name
FROM face_detection_info fdi left join
user_info
ui on fdi.user_info_user_info_id_2 = ui.user_info_id
left join (select resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, related_table_name, related_table_key, relate_table_column_name from static_resources where related_table_name='face_detection_info' and relate_table_column_name='upload_image') as upload_image on upload_image.related_table_key=fdi.face_detection_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
